tiles.name: old_scrubland_clearing
tiles.description: The ancestral meeting ground, marked by the gnarled Joshua tree. A neutral haven for avian clans amidst the encroaching city.

tiles.name: sagebrush_ridge
tiles.description: A line of low hills covered in sagebrush, offering a vantage point over the scrubland and a natural border between territories.

tiles.name: whispering_canyon
tiles.description: A narrow canyon known for its echoing winds, a place of ancient legends and rumored Crimsonwing rituals.

tiles.name: arid_riverbed
tiles.description: A dry riverbed that occasionally floods during heavy rains, a vital but unreliable source of water for the scrubland.

tiles.name: outskirts_solar_farm
tiles.description: Rows upon rows of solar panels stretch across the horizon, providing power to the city but disrupting the natural landscape.

tiles.name: transmission_tower_zone
tiles.description: A cluster of towering transmission towers humming with energy, a symbol of the city's reach into the scrubland.

tiles.name: old_avian_watchtower
tiles.description: A crumbling stone structure, a relic of the past when avian clans defended their territory against rivals.

tiles.name: abandoned_settler_farm
tiles.description: The remains of a failed human settlement, reclaimed by the desert and a testament to the scrubland's harshness.

tiles.name: edge_of_the_concrete
tiles.description: Where the scrubland meets the first signs of urban sprawl: broken asphalt, discarded materials, and struggling vegetation.

tiles.name: sector_7_industrial_outskirts
tiles.description: A sprawling industrial sector with factories, warehouses, and freight yards pushing against the scrubland's edge.

tiles.name: the_crimsonwing_roost
tiles.description: A complex of nests high in a mesa, home to KiraKira's clan and a stronghold of Crimsonwing tradition.

tiles.name: northern_scrub_flats
tiles.description: Expansive flatlands covered in low scrub, providing shelter for ground-nesting birds and small mammals.

tiles.name: dust_devil_ravine
tiles.description: A deep ravine carved by centuries of wind erosion, a treacherous but scenic landscape.

tiles.name: the_cactus_garden
tiles.description: A surprisingly lush area with a wide variety of cacti, providing food and shelter for desert wildlife.

tiles.name: abandoned_mining_outpost
tiles.description: A derelict mining site, scarred by past exploitation and a source of environmental contamination.

tiles.name: the_high_voltage_corridor
tiles.description: A wide swath of cleared land beneath high-voltage power lines, disrupting the natural habitat and creating an artificial boundary.

tiles.name: sector_7_checkpoint
tiles.description: A guarded checkpoint controlling access to the industrial sector, a symbol of the city's security measures.

tiles.name: scrubland_overlook_park
tiles.description: A small park offering panoramic views of the scrubland, a popular spot for city dwellers seeking a glimpse of nature.

tiles.name: sector_8_residential_fringe
tiles.description: A zone of hastily constructed housing developments, where city life encroaches on the desert landscape.

tiles.name: old_highway_66_ruins
tiles.description: A decaying stretch of the historic Route 66, a forgotten relic of a bygone era.

tiles.name: the_avian_graveyard
tiles.description: A desolate canyon where fallen avian clan members are laid to rest, a place of somber reflection and respect.

tiles.name: buzzard_perch
tiles.description: A rocky outcrop favored by buzzards, offering a commanding view of the surrounding scrubland.

tiles.name: lost_creek_oasis
tiles.description: A small oasis fed by an underground spring, a vital source of water and a haven for wildlife.

tiles.name: the_broken_fence
tiles.description: A dilapidated fence marking the boundary between the scrubland and a private ranch, a symbol of human encroachment.

tiles.name: sector_7_contaminated_zone
tiles.description: A heavily polluted area near the factories, where the air is thick with toxins and the ground is barren.

tiles.name: radio_communications_array
tiles.description: A cluster of radio antennas beaming signals into the city, a reminder of the scrubland's strategic importance.

tiles.name: dust_bowl_reclamation_site
tiles.description: An area where human efforts attempt to restore vegetation to the barren land, a symbol of hope and perseverance.

tiles.name: the_shady_motel
tiles.description: A run-down motel on the edge of the highway, a haven for transients and a place of dubious reputation.

tiles.name: sector_8_light_industrial_park
tiles.description: A district with smaller factories and warehouses, transitioning from industrial to residential areas.

tiles.name: the_forgotten_mine
tiles.description: A collapsed mine shaft, a dark and dangerous place rumored to be haunted by the spirits of lost miners.

tiles.name: goldenfeather_territory_border
tiles.description: The edge of the Goldenfeather clan's hunting grounds. Tensions are usually high here.

tiles.name: sage_grouse_lek
tiles.description: A traditional mating ground for Sage Grouse, now threatened by habitat loss and noise pollution.

tiles.name: blackrock_spring
tiles.description: A small, brackish spring nestled among black rocks, providing water for smaller creatures.

tiles.name: the_old_buffalo_trail
tiles.description: A faint, overgrown path that once served as a migration route for buffalo, now a ghost of the past.

tiles.name: abandoned_test_site
tiles.description: A restricted area contaminated with unknown substances, a legacy of secret government experiments.

tiles.name: city_water_pipeline
tiles.description: An above-ground pipeline carrying water from distant sources to the city, a lifeline and an eyesore.

tiles.name: the_satellite_city
tiles.description: A small, dependent town that is almost entirely composed of commuter housing.

tiles.name: sector_8_community_gardens
tiles.description: Small plots where city dwellers can grow their own food, a community project and a source of fresh produce.

tiles.name: the_scrapland_salvage_yard
tiles.description: Where old machinery and electronics are torn apart for valuable parts. An ugly but potentially rewarding locale.

tiles.name: the_black_mesa_vista_point
tiles.description: A scenic overlook atop a black mesa, offering spectacular views of the scrubland and city lights.

tiles.name: hidden_crimsonwing_cache
tiles.description: A stashed supply of essential survival items and shiny objects, for emergencies or bartering.

tiles.name: coyote_canyon
tiles.description: A deep canyon favored by coyotes, known for its challenging terrain and echoing howls.

tiles.name: the_medicine_rock
tiles.description: A sacred site with ancient petroglyphs, believed to hold healing powers by some avian clans.

tiles.name: border_patrol_station
tiles.description: A facility monitoring for movement, its drones a constant presence in the sky.

tiles.name: the_dry_lakebed_airstrip
tiles.description: An illegal landing strip used by smugglers and those looking to avoid the city's checkpoints.

tiles.name: the_old_research_facility
tiles.description: Ruined lab with traces of early cloning and genetic manipulation. Many stories swirl about this site.

tiles.name: the_edge_of_the_grid
tiles.description: The point where electricity becomes intermittent; unreliable power makes life difficult here.

tiles.name: the_prepper_community
tiles.description: An isolated settlement of survivalists, suspicious of outsiders and heavily armed.

tiles.name: sector_8_recycling_plant
tiles.description: Endless mountains of crushed cars and bottles, a place where the city sends its refuse.

tiles.name: the_starry_sky_observatory
tiles.description: A remote observatory offering breathtaking views of the night sky, far from the city's light pollution.

tiles.name: ancient_avian_burial_ground
tiles.description: A sacred site where avian clans inter their dead, imbued with solemn energy.

tiles.name: painted_desert_rocks
tiles.description: Vibrant rock formations create surreal landscapes, a testament to time's artistic touch.

tiles.name: bat_cave_entrance
tiles.description: A hidden cave system teeming with bats, a vital ecosystem and a mysterious realm.

tiles.name: old_trading_post_ruins
tiles.description: Remnants of a historical outpost where cultures exchanged goods, echoing tales of past interactions.

tiles.name: sector_7_water_reclamation_plant
tiles.description: A facility dedicated to recycling water, combating the scarcity and promoting sustainability.

tiles.name: cell_tower_relay
tiles.description: A crucial communication point, connecting isolated regions with urban centers.

tiles.name: artisan_cultivation_site
tiles.description: Individuals grow plants for crafts and practical purposes, showcasing a unique blend of nature and art.

tiles.name: sector_8_eco-village
tiles.description: A community embracing sustainable practices, dedicated to harmony with the environment.

tiles.name: the_scrap_metal_sculpture_park
tiles.description: Creative sculptures made from recycled metal, reflecting the artistry within discarded waste.

tiles.name: the_deep_space_listening_post
tiles.description: Transmitting waves for communication across the cosmos, hopeful for signals from other worlds.

tiles.name: hidden_falcon_training_grounds
tiles.description: Secret location where agile falcons learn the skies, honing their hunting and agility skills.

tiles.name: redrock_maze_canyons
tiles.description: Intricate canyons forming a labyrinthine landscape, testing travelers' orientation and survival skills.

tiles.name: the_ancient_oracle_cave
tiles.description: Mysterious cavern where prophecies were divined, echoing with cryptic visions of the future.

tiles.name: sector_8_agricultural_zone
tiles.description: Cultivated fields striving to support the city, balancing food production with environmental preservation.

tiles.name: sector_7_resource_extraction_plant
tiles.description: Extracting minerals and resources, essential for sustaining modern industries.

tiles.name: intercity_expressway_transition
tiles.description: Where high-speed roads diverge into local routes, the gateway to distant destinations.

tiles.name: the_hidden_moonshine_distillery
tiles.description: Backwoods operation producing illicit spirits, notorious among the denizens of the scrublands.

tiles.name: sector_8_urban_farming_cluster
tiles.description: Community initiatives growing food in urban areas, promoting sustainability and local sustenance.

tiles.name: the_junkyard_fortress
tiles.description: A makeshift stronghold built amidst scrap, sheltering those seeking escape or refuge.

tiles.name: cosmic_ray_observatory
tiles.description: Researching particles from across the cosmos, investigating the universe's fundamental nature.

tiles.name: the_sagebrush_sanctuary
tiles.description: Protected space supporting scrub biome, a haven for avian clans preserving tradition.

tiles.name: weathered_mesa_plateau
tiles.description: Elevated region sculpted by nature, a natural bastion resisting time.

tiles.name: the_whispering_caves
tiles.description: Intriguing underground passages resonate with rumors, intriguing explorers.

tiles.name: ancient_avian_migration_route
tiles.description: Time-honored path followed by airborne clans, linking habitats across vast distances.

tiles.name: sector_7_bioremediation_facility
tiles.description: Cleanup facility employing organic systems, fighting environmental hazards effectively.

tiles.name: urban_drone_infrastructure
tiles.description: Drone hub for delivery, a futuristic system optimizing urban operations.

tiles.name: innovative_horticultural_site
tiles.description: Experimental location employing progressive horticulture, nurturing life amidst urban confines.

tiles.name: sector_8_co-living_village
tiles.description: Community fosters sustainability, embracing cooperation to minimize waste.

tiles.name: the_reclaimed_metal_workshop
tiles.description: Creative business using salvage materials, giving refuse novel form.

tiles.name: distant_astronomical_arrays
tiles.description: Extensive sensor arrays detect celestial phenomena, dedicated to astronomical studies.

tiles.name: scrubland_clan_negotiation_site
tiles.description: Neutral gathering place with unspoken accord, brokering peace among avian coalitions.

tiles.name: ancient_rock_art_zone
tiles.description: Rock art revealing heritage, depicting stories and cultures of past eras.

tiles.name: cryptic_sinkhole_entrance
tiles.description: Subterranean entrance with unknown depths, sparking curiosity about what lies below.

tiles.name: the_forgotten_trade_outpost
tiles.description: Ghostly remnants of commerce, whispering recollections of past trades.

tiles.name: sector_7_energy_conversion_station
tiles.description: Complex transforming power for distribution, ensuring constant illumination for urban dwellers.

tiles.name: advanced_communication_hub
tiles.description: Cutting-edge infrastructure providing internet, connecting inhabitants around the globe.

tiles.name: artistic_aquaponic_project
tiles.description: Showcasing sustainable agriculture, mixing aquatic life with plant cultivation creatively.

tiles.name: sector_8_collaborative_complex
tiles.description: Building with communal amenities, fostering unity among urban residents.

tiles.name: upcycled_building_initiative
tiles.description: Sustainable enterprise creatively transforms materials, repurposing structures.

tiles.name: deep_space_telemetry_installation
tiles.description: Observatory receives distant signals, gathering astronomical intelligence about the cosmos.

tiles.name: ancient_avian_wisdom_keep
tiles.description: Hidden archive storing ancient avian scrolls, protecting invaluable lessons.

tiles.name: mysterious_crystal_cave
tiles.description: Cave glows with otherworldly light, reflecting secrets about subterranean wonders.

tiles.name: elusive_mirage_oasis
tiles.description: Appearing and vanishing with the heat, symbol for illusion and desire.

tiles.name: sector_7_energy_storage_complex
tiles.description: Reservoir maintains city illumination, critical in ensuring electricity is constant.

tiles.name: sustainable_technological_site
tiles.description: Innovative business mixes sustainability, employing advanced technological approaches.

tiles.name: sector_8_mixed_use_region
tiles.description: Modern integration creating dynamism, seamlessly combining residential and entrepreneurial zones.

tiles.name: the_altered_waste_creation
tiles.description: Workshop uses recycled material into something more, symbolizing invention in urban disposal.

tiles.name: cosmic_energy_sensor_site
tiles.description: Remote point detects stellar forces, collecting data about universal radiation.
tiles.name: sector_7_energy_source_site
tiles.description: Station taps alternative force, demonstrating progressive practices in generation.

tiles.name: sector_8_community_fusion_spot
tiles.description: Modern square fosters relationships, blending together inhabitants from diverse backgrounds.
